channel.title: Npc spawning
channel.description:
Hey guys I got this 667 ye I put 10 crabs in the npcspawning.java
and compiled and tried to attk them but i cant attack them they are just standing there not moving cant be attacked and now I added glacors and neither can I attack them? Anyone help o-O

item.title: Npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @Keyal Keyal
item.description:
@Keyal wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:2, topic:446073”]Probably because the npcs don’t have anything set for them. They don’t have an attack style or anim set or any health so they are kinda just there. You will have to edit the npc defs for them and I’m pretty there is a tool included in every 667 to do that.[/quote]is that easy or is that a pain in the ass? could you maybe explain ? And yes there is indeed a tool

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Probably because the npcs don’t have anything set for them. They don’t have an attack style or anim set or any health so they are kinda just there. You will have to edit the npc defs for them and I’m pretty there is a tool included in every 667 to do that.

Read full topic
